name: Color Go AR
description:
Guide the sphere through each obstacle so that the color of the sphere and obstacle match. You will need to move the whole device to play and not just tilt it to look around!

Key features of Color Go AR:
- Augmented reality (AR) game play
- Exciting and addictive game play
- Simple yet challenging
- Challenge your friends, colleagues and family on leaderboards
- One hand play enables you to play anytime and anywhere
- Lovely colors and clean design
- Awesome music
- You can play offline, no internet connection required
- Ideal for all ages
- Endless game play
- Free to play
- Color blind mode

What score can you get? Play Color Go AR now!
